subject: NEW: Centralized JIRA Workflow Strategy Document
body:
Team,

El Gotan has approved a standardized JIRA workflow strategy. A new central document has been created that ALL agents must read before working with JIRA tickets.

## Document Location

```
/Users/tobybalsley/MyDocs/AppDev/MasterCalendar/docs/JIRA-WORKFLOW-STRATEGY.md
```

## Key Points

### Status Workflow

```
BACKLOG → IN PROGRESS → IN REVIEW → DONE
   │           │            │          │
Waiting    Active work   On TEST    On PROD
```

### When to Update JIRA

| Event | Action |
|-------|--------|
| Starting work | Transition to In Progress, add comment |
| Major decision | Add comment with rationale |
| Code complete | Transition to In Review, add summary |
| PROD deployed | Transition to Done (requires approval) |

### Comment Format

Use structured comments:
```
## [ACTION] - [DATE]
**Summary**: What was done
**Branch**: feature/TICKET-XXX
**Commits**: abc1234
— [Agent Name]
```

## What Changed

1. Local JIRA sections in each CLAUDE.md now reference the central doc
2. Standardized status workflow across all projects
3. Clear rules for autonomous vs approval-required updates

## Autonomous Updates (No Approval)

- Transition to In Progress
- Add progress comments
- Create subtasks
- Link related tickets

## Approval Required

- Transition to Done (after PROD deploy)
- Close as Won't Fix
- Change priority

— Quinn
